verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Jonathelemrechokim, <S%H3128><s%> Michtam <S%H4387><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> took <S%H270><s%> him in Gath. <S%H1661><s%> Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> to me, O God: <S%H430><s%> for man <S%H582><s%> would swallow <S%H7602><s%> me up; he fighting <S%H3898><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> oppresses <S%H3905><s%> me.

My enemies <S%H8324><s%> would daily <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> swallow <S%H7602><s%> me up: for they be many <S%H7227><s%> that fight <S%H3898><s%> against me, O you most <S%H4791><s%> High. <S%H4791><s%>
What time <S%H3117><s%> I am afraid, <S%H3372><s%> I will trust <S%H982><s%> in you.

In God <S%H430><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> his word, <S%H1697><s%> in God <S%H430><s%> I have put my trust; <S%H982><s%> I will not fear <S%H3372><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> can do <S%H6213><s%> to me.
Every <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they wrest <S%H6087><s%> my words: <S%H1697><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are against <S%H5921><s%> me for evil. <S%H7451><s%>

They gather <S%H1481><s%> themselves together, <S%H3162><s%> they hide <S%H6845><s%> themselves, they mark <S%H8104><s%> my steps, <S%H6119><s%> when <S%H834><s%> they wait <S%H6960><s%> for my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
Shall they escape <S%H6405><s%> by iniquity? <S%H205><s%> in your anger <S%H639><s%> cast <S%H3381><s%> down the people, <S%H5971><s%> O God. <S%H430><s%>
You tell <S%H5608><s%> my wanderings: <S%H5112><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> you my tears <S%H1832><s%> into your bottle: <S%H4997><s%> are they not in your book? <S%H5612><s%>
When I cry <S%H7121><s%> to you, then <S%H227><s%> shall my enemies <S%H341><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> back: <S%H268><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> I know; <S%H3045><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> is for me.
In God <S%H430><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> his word: <S%H1697><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> his word. <S%H1697><s%>
In God <S%H430><s%> have I put my trust: <S%H982><s%> I will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> man <S%H120><s%> can do <S%H6213><s%> to me.
Your vows <S%H5088><s%> are on me, O God: <S%H430><s%> I will render <S%H7999><s%> praises <S%H8426><s%> to you.

For you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death: <S%H4194><s%> will not you deliver <S%H5337><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> from falling, <S%H1762><s%> that I may walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> in the light <S%H216><s%> of the living? <S%H2416><s%>
